2024.title: AI-powered Frontend
2024.description: Integrating on-device and server-side AI to enhance UX: code generation, layout suggestions, and accessibility improvements.

2024.title: Serverless Edge Functions
2024.description: Deploying lightweight serverless functions at edge locations for personalization and low-latency compute.

2024.title: Typed CSS (CSS Modules / CSS-in-TypeScript)
2024.description: Stronger typing for styles to catch errors at compile-time and enable better editor tooling.

2024.title: Privacy-preserving Analytics
2024.description: Analytics approaches that avoid cross-site trackers, leveraging aggregated or differential-privacy techniques.

2024.title: Micro-frontend Architectures
2024.description: Composing independently deployable frontend modules to scale teams and codebases while preserving UX cohesion.
